Package ca.corefacility.gview.style

Provides for storage/manipulation of style information for GView.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
GlobalStyle Stores all the information would effect the appearance of the map independent of the data.
MapStyle The main style class.
StyleFactory A class which stores/creates some styles that are used many times.
 

Package ca.corefacility.gview.style Description

Provides for storage/manipulation of style information for GView. All style information is stored within the MapStyle class.
